item.title: [GRA2][Infrastructure] - Electrical background work Room G220A &B
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 20, 21:00 UTC  -  Mar 21, 00:00 UTC

Jan 29, 13:18 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

This will affect availability of your servers.

Start time : 20/03/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 21/03/2025 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unavailable during the maintenance operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out an electrical upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters. To protect your data from any impact, we advise you to first restart your machines in rescue mode (How to activate and use rescue mode) before the operation mentioned above.

Every client concerned by this maintenance will be contacted.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [LIM] - Upgrade of network infrastrucure
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 26, 21:00 UTC  -  Feb 27, 05:00 UTC

Feb 7, 15:53 UTC
Scheduled - As part of the continuous improvement of our services, we have planned an evolution of the network infrastructure on the Limburg site on February 26, 2025.

Start time : 26/02/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 27/02/2025 05:00 UTC
Service impact : None expected
Service improvement : Network scaling capacity

This maintenance will be structured around three phases, described in detail below:

Step 1 : preparation of the maintenance operation (about 2 hours)
Step 2 : implementation of the new infrastructure (about 3 hours)
Step 3 : test and activation of the new infrastructure (about3 hours)

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve our services.

Thank you for your understanding.
